(1) Things go up by 2

The left-to-right transformation in the top of the puzzle involves the number of objects, which increases by two in each step. The puzzle starts with one cookie, and in the next step, there are two cookies. The transformation continues in this manner, with the number of cookies increasing by two in each step. This rule best describes the transformation in the top of the puzzle.

Step-by-step reasoning:

1. One cookie on the left.
2. Two cookies on the left.
3. Four cookies on the left.
4. Six cookies on the left.
5. Eight cookies on the left.
6. Ten cookies on the left.
7. Twelve cookies on the left.
8. Fourteen cookies on the left.
9. Sixteen cookies on the left.
10. Eighteen cookies on the left.

In each step, the number of cookies increases by two, following the rule (1) Things go up by 2.</s>
